metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2109 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In MakeMPEG4VideoCodecSpecificData of AVIExtractor.cpp, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to remote code execution with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is needed for exploitation. Product: Android. Versions: Android-7.0 Android-7.1.1 Android-7.1.2 Android-8.0 Android-8.1. Android ID: A-130651570.

criterions.comment: android package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
